Lansdowne Oil & Gas Company Profile

Lansdowne Oil & Gas plc is an upstream oil and gas group, focused on exploration and appraisal opportunities for oil and gas reserves offshore Ireland. The Company focuses on the Irish offshore shelf areas for exploration. The Company has interest in 01/11 Barryroe Exploration License and 2/07 Helvick Exploration License. Barryroe incorporates part blocks 48/22, 48/23, 48/24, 48/27, 48/28, 48/29 and 48/30 covering an area of approximately 610 square kilometers along the axis of the North Celtic Sea Basin. The Barryroe License is held by the Company (20%) and Providence Resources plc (80%). The Helvick field is situated approximately 40 kilometers offshore Ireland in circa 80 meters (265 feet) water depth. Read More
